name: Old River Pine
notes: Started from nursery stock in late 1980s. Subtle taper achieved through staged leader cuts.

care.watering: Allow to dry slightly between waterings; reduce in winter.
care.pruning: Pinch candles in late spring; structural cuts mid-winter.
care.wiring: Late autumn on lignified growth; check monthly.

name: Courtyard Maple
notes: Air-layered in the 1990s; refined through clip-and-grow technique.

care.watering: Keep evenly moist; never allow to dry completely.
care.pruning: Partial defoliation in early summer; remove crossing shoots.

name: Gum on the Ridge
notes: Native seedling; apex shaped by years of westerly winds.

care.pruning: Backbuds strongly; pinch soft tips often in season.
care.repotting: Every 2 years; tolerates root trims well.
